posts.content: I am selling my original 1964 21 window walk-tru Samba. M-Code plates are there. True hippie-bus from the wild 60s, handmade flowers, behind the "paint" is the OG paint in good conditions, in the rear is a rock'n roll bed, extra heater, engine is new, bus is runing and driving, with all papers, sold as a restauration project, price is 37,500 EUR
